import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "./App.css"; import VendorList from "./components/VendorList"; function App() { const [vendors, setVendors] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:5000/vendors") .then((response) => setVendors(response.data)) .catch((error) => console.error("Error fetching vendors:", error)); }, []); return (
